content:
You're welcome! It was my pleasure to help. Researching online marketplaces, forums, and price guides is a great way to get a rough estimate of your Funko POP! collection's value. And if you're still unsure, consulting a professional appraiser can provide a more accurate estimate.

Remember to stay organized, keep track of your research, and take notes on the values you find. This will help you make a more informed decision about what to do with your collection.

Also, don't forget to consider the condition, rarity, and demand of your figures when researching their value. These factors can greatly impact the value of your collection.

If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask. Good luck with your research, and I hope you get a good estimate of your Funko POP! collection's value!

Happy collecting!
